description: Try our easy to follow Vegan Coconut, Cranberry & Nut Fudge recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pudding,Pescatarian,Nov 2019,Seafood free,Low salt,Wheat free,Egg free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Vegan Coconut, Cranberry & Nut Fudge Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a 18x28cm baking tin with baking paper.

Process macadamia and coconut in a food processor until very finely chopped. Add icing sugar and margarine spread and blitz to combine. Spread mixture into tin and press pistachios and cranberries into surface. Refrigerate for at least 15 minutes or until firm. Cut into star shapes and store in the fridge until ready to serve.
